classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes foundational model training, data collection, inference, alignment, and evaluation, aligning with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer. While it mentions LLMs, the focus is on the underlying infrastructure and methods for training and optimizing these models, rather than application development or advanced prompt engineering.
